Radistor, upon hearing this, looked at the Maximals with an I was right
look. Radistor ran to grapple with  Oblitercon...
----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 20, 2000 4:29 AM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars RPG


The Oblitercons (Oblitertron):


Oblitertron watched events slowly, easily sensing the rising fear and
"edginess" in most of the Maximals.  It excited his mind composed of 5
Oblitercons, though only one was in total control.
    Seeing a large robot beginning to approach him, though it was a beast,
Oblitertron raised his laser pistol, aiming at the beast mode.  Getting
ready
to pull the trigger, "he" stopped when hearing Iron Raptor speak.

-��- Dark One, in control of Oblitertron, was about to lower his weapon,
when
inside Oblitertron's mind, in a blue and red vortex, a pair of red hands
grabbed Dark One, throwing him out, Pyro taking control -��-

Oblitertron smiled slightly, looking around.  Raising his pistol, he fired a
single shot off at Iron Raptor, an optic blast off at Tavatron and Dinobot,
though it had a low chance of actually hitting, but Oblitertron's not real
intelligent "mind" didn't care as long as something happened.  "WE LIVE FOR
OBLITERATION!  DIE MAXIMALS!" his gargantuan voice boomed.
